dialogue.library_intro: Third of the Hatsuharu-class, Wakaba. I participated in the Attu and Kiska Island exit operations. Yes, the Northern forces. Ah, be careful of heavy fog. It's easy to get hit. Especially 'Hatsushimo', you need to watch out for her.
dialogue.secretary3: Hm? This unbreakable Morse code, what is it's meaning?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Time is valuable. As we stay like this, situation will change. My body is tingling all over...
dialogue.secretarymarried: I should rest, you say? I appreciate your kindness, Admiral, but please allow me to continue my fleet duty... I'm fine.
dialogue.wedding: The miracle battle, Kiska! Kissâ€¦ ka? Hey, wait! Your face is too close!
dialogue.show_players_score: Good idea, let's review our current situation.
dialogue.equipment1: Mm, it's all good. I appreciate it!
dialogue.equipment2: The Hatsuharu-class have no problem after an improvement. I can do it.
dialogue.supply: Thank you. With this I can fight again.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Is that so... If I get repaired I can fight again soon. Soon.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has returned from the repair.
dialogue.night_battle: I've been waiting for this moment.
dialogue.mvp: So, this is the miracle Kiska operation? What, I'm mistaken?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: It hurts... but, I don't mind...
dialogue.sunk: Wakaba. Is sunk. I... hate it.. a bit...
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's the new year, huh. I've been waiting for this moment. Admiral, I will be counting on you again this year. Yes, I'll be fine!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas,huh.it's fine! If it's turkey and cake we've already bought them. It's fine!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun? Should I throw this bean at the admiral? No, that's not right. Then what should I do?
